name: vibe-vista-coding-assistant
description: A Discord bot that helps users brainstorm coding ideas using Gemini AI.

scripts.start:testbot: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.test
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'node dist/index.js' || echo 'No running bot found'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 1 && npm run start:test
scripts.restart:testbot: npm run stop && sleep 1 && npm run start:testbot
scripts.test:news: npm run build && node -e "console.log('뉴스 기능을 테스트하려면 Discord에서 /testnews 명령어를 사용하세요!')"
scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run test:features
scripts.test:all: npm run test:features && npm run test:local
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test:features

author: jeonbyeongmin
